INTERESTS

PHP Developer                                                                                                        Bangalore 
Silqen Software Pvt. Ltd. 
06/2022 – 04/2023 
Achievements/Tasks 
Strong knowledge of PHP web frameworks such as Laravel. 
Worked on large scale Laravel applications. 
Good knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and AJAX etc. 
Good knowledge in MySQL, Database design and query 
optimization  
 
PHP Developer 
Aszen Technologies(OPC) Pvt. Ltd. 
01/2022 - 05/2022, Bangalore 
Achievements/Tasks 
Designed and developed web applications using PHP 
Created user interface by using standard HTML, CSS and Bootstrap 
practices. 
Efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules. 
Knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming 
 
 
Projects 
*Light Age Masters (https://lightagemasters.com/)                                                
Description: 
LightAgeMasters is a non-political and non-religious charitable trust.  
Mainly focus of this website is the wellbeing of its client’s and spiritual guidance. 
The objective of this project is to manage organization’s student activities.  
Almost the whole website is dynamic including all the contents you see in frontend.   
It Contains around fourteen modules which has their own functionalities. 
Environment: HTML5, Bootstrap, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, MySQL, Laravel framework. 
 
*SchoolsPe (https://www.schoolspe.com/)                          
Description: 
SchoolsPe is the premier destination for student admissions across all disciplines, 
from pre -university to business school. 
Offers a convenient platform for educational institutions and the student-parent community 
to smoothen the admission process. 
Environment: HTML5, Bootstrap, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, MySQL, Laravel framework. 
 
EDUCATION 
 
Master of Science (Information Science) 
Manipal Academy of Higher Education, Manipal  
06/2018 - 07/2020 
 
Bachelor of Science (Computer Science) 
Mangalore University, Mangalore  
06/2015 - 07/2018 
 
  
Ajax HTML CSS 
Alvita Roycy Castelino  
PHP Developer
